title: UNU Interactive Cat Toy, Automatic Cat Ball Toy with Mat, Rechargeable & Motion Activated, Hide and Seek Game for Indoor Cats Kitten

features: Hide and Seek Game: Our interactive cat toys adopt 2-in-1 design, allowing your cat to enjoy the fun of chasing and hunting.The electric ball bounces and rolls in the pouch, stimulating the kitten's hunting instincts such as chasing and pouncing

Upgraded pouch design: Made of thickened safety anti-wrinkle material and prevent cats from scratching or biting. Equipped with a retractable elastic band next to the pouch opening, you can easily identify the pouch opening and easy to store

Motion Activated: Press and hold for 5 seconds to power on. After running for 5 minutes, the ball automatically enters standby mode and activate the game again by slapping the ball. If the ball is not touched for a long period of time, it will turn off automatically

Three Working Modes: This automatic cat toy is designed with three motion modes, which are fast rolling, slow rolling and interactive mode. You can choose the appropriate mode according to the cat's playing style so that your cat can play happily

Rechargeable and LED light: This cat ball has a built-in rechargeable battery that can be recharged with the included USB charging cable, fully charging the toy in just 2-3 hour. The LED light colors indicate different working modes, fast mode-blue light, slow mode-purple light, interactive mode-yellow light
description: Product Description Easy to Use Charging 2h before use install the plush cover Long press 5s to power it on Put in the pouch and game start
